text: Girl with Hair Ribbon is a 1965 pop art painting, by Roy Lichtenstein. It was purchased by the Museum of Contemporary Art in Tokyo, for $6 million. ==See also== * 1965 in art ==Notes== ==External links== *Lichtenstein Foundation website *Masterworks: American Painting of the 1950s and 60s, Girl With Hair Ribbon, 1965 directed by Reiner Moritz, 1938-, in Masterworks: American Painting of the 1950s and 60s (Germany: ArtHaus Musik, 1988), 10 mins Category:1965 paintings Category:Paintings by Roy Lichtenstein Category:Paintings in Japan
title: Girl with Hair Ribbon
